messages.subject: many thanks
messages.msgSnippet: Many thanks to all for the software suggestions. I especially appreciated the idea about downloading portions to see if my son will like it before we buy it.
messages.messageBody:
Many thanks to all for the software suggestions. I especially appreciated
the idea about downloading portions to see if my son will like it before we
buy it. We have a DK distributor here in town, too. I'm going to check out
Zoombinis, Yoiks, Mathblaster, Readingblaster and Mathquest and let you all
know how Tony and I like them.

Thanks again, I couldn't have gotten such great, timely advice anywhere
else.

Annette
